function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Strong effect of interpersonal globalisation","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission through personal interactions","Mitigation":"Implement strict social distancing measures and limit gatherings","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, surveillance technology","People":"General population, travelers, migrants","Owner":"Government, healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Negative impact of trade globalisation","Impact":"Potential for increased spread of disease through trade interactions","Mitigation":"Strengthen trade regulations and implement health checks at borders","Technologies":"Health screening technology, trade monitoring systems","People":"Trade workers, border control authorities","Owner":"Government, trade organizations"},{"Description":"Counterintuitive impact of globalisation in later weeks","Impact":"Delayed response to disease diffusion in more globalised countries","Mitigation":"Increase awareness and preparedness for late-stage outbreaks in globalised regions","Technologies":"Data analytics, predictive modeling","People":"Policy makers, healthcare authorities, global business leaders","Owner":"Government, international health organizations"}]}
